com.epimorphics.lda.core

Interface APIEndpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    APIEndpointImpl

    public interface APIEndpoint
    An particular api endpoint receives "calls" (can be GET or POST) via a Router, extracts the parameters defining the request, combines that with some underlying API specification, retrieves the relevant results page and returns it with the appropriate Mime type.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  APIEndpoint.Request 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResponseResult call(APIEndpoint.Request r, NoteBoard nb)
      Called by the Router to invoke the API and return set of result matches
      Bindings defaults()
      Return any default bindings that this endpoint has set up (which need not be ones specified by a config).
      com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource getMetadata(Bindings context, URI requestURI, String formatName, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model metadata)
      Return a metadata description for the query that would be run by this endpoint
      String getPrefixPath()
      An API spec (and hence an endpoint) may have been defined with a prefix path string, which follows the context path.
      Renderer getRendererByType(MediaType mt)
      Return the renderer known by the given media type.
      Renderer getRendererNamed(String name)
      Return the renderer known by the given name.
      APIEndpointSpec getSpec()
      Return the specification for this endpoint
      String getURITemplate()
      The URI template at which this APIEndpoint should be attached

    • Method Detail

      • getURITemplate

        String getURITemplate()
        The URI template at which this APIEndpoint should be attached

      • call

        ResponseResult call(APIEndpoint.Request r,
                  NoteBoard nb)
        Called by the Router to invoke the API and return set of result matches
        Parameters:
        r - the request
        Returns:
        ResponseResult: the ResultSet for rendering and the call context used for the result set.

      • defaults

        Bindings defaults()
        Return any default bindings that this endpoint has set up (which need not be ones specified by a config).

      • getPrefixPath

        String getPrefixPath()
        An API spec (and hence an endpoint) may have been defined with a prefix path string, which follows the context path. Return the prefix path, or the empty string if it was defined with no prefix path.
